doc.name: Cloud

intro.title: There’s a new way to work and it’s made with IBM Cloud
intro.description: With the cloud, realizing ambitions has never been so full of productivity.  The IBM Cloud’s Infrastructure-as-a-Service (IaaS) offers a combination of physical and virtual machines to give you flexibility without compromising performance and control.   With our Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) offerings, all you have to do is plug in and subscribe to get the best of IBM’s solutions.  And with our Platform-as-a-Service (PaaS) offerings, ensure that your ideas are developed into market-ready products with less time and anxiety.
intro.name: Cloud Hero

silverpop.description: Every business is now in the software business. Because everything—from core systems and processes to applications that handle functions like HR and CRM—depends on your software choices. IBM SaaS applications deliver easy upgrades and seamless integration. Because software should help you do your job, not become your job.
silverpop.deeplink_description: Customers want experiences made for them. See how Silverpop, a marketing automation platform, lets you personalize messages at scale.
silverpop.name: silverpop-default

silverpop.description: Every business is now in the software business. Because everything—from core systems and processes to applications that handle functions like HR and CRM—depends on your software choices. IBM SaaS applications deliver easy upgrades and seamless integration. Because software should help you do your job, not become your job.
silverpop.subhead: There's a new expectation of "work." Teams need constant access, simple interfaces, automatic updates and customizable options. All with a low learning curve. With IBM SaaS solutions, you can deliver just that—with lower up-front costs, seamless integration, and quick and easy upgrades as you need them. There are more than 250 SaaS products to help you lighten your management workload and offer your business a new way to work.

silverpop.deeplink_description: Customers want experiences made for them. See how Silverpop, a marketing automation platform, lets you personalize messages at scale.
silverpop.subhead: Silverpop lets you target customers at every touch point. It’s marketing automation software that is simple to deploy and even easier to use—accessible from any device, anytime, no matter where you are. Now you can churn through customer behavioral data to gather real-time insights and deliver custom experiences and messaging across the entire purchasing journey. So you reach the right people at the right time.

bluemix.description: Delegate the dirty work with IBM Bluemix, an open standards platform that lets developers build, run and manage all kinds of apps. Bluemix brings a full suite of cloud services to one place. So whether you’re creating apps for the web, for mobile or for Big Data Bluemix helps build them better and get them to market faster.
bluemix.deeplink_description: Where you build your app affects how quickly it gets made. See  how cloud-based IBM Bluemix leads to faster app development.
bluemix.name: bluemix-default

bluemix.description: Delegate the dirty work with IBM Bluemix, an open standards platform that lets developers build, run and manage all kinds of apps. Bluemix brings a full suite of cloud services to one place. So whether you’re creating apps for the web, for mobile or for Big Data, Bluemix helps build them better and get them to market faster.
bluemix.subhead: With Bluemix, you don’t have to wait for infrastructure provisioning, service integration or code migration. Those services, and more, come preconfigured to lighten your development team’s workload. Backed by the flexibility of SoftLayer™ and the enterprise reliability of IBM, Bluemix lets developers work with agility and speed.
bluemix.deeplink_description: Where you build your app affects how quickly it gets made. See  how cloud-based IBM Bluemix leads to faster app development.
bluemix.quote_copy: What WebSphere is for the web, Bluemix is for the cloud.
bluemix.name: bluemix-lob

bluemix.subhead: Bluemix elevates what PaaS can do. New features include the ability to drag and drop code, a broader choice of developer languages and an easier-to-use interface. Bluemix seamlessly integrates with both IBM and other third-party services, allowing you to do everything—from virtualizing an entire system to connecting a database—in the cloud.

softlayer.deeplink_description: Control of your cloud should belong to you. See how SoftLayer gives you oversight of your infrastructure as you build it.
softlayer.description: If you have a demanding cloud application, you need SoftLayer™. It provides the flexibility of both virtual and dedicated bare metal servers, but is as easy to deploy as a public cloud. SoftLayer™ gives you the high performance you need without having to sacrifice control.
softlayer.subhead: Not all clouds are the same. While other services provision at the hypervisor level, SoftLayer™ provisions the very server, storage and piece of security hardware your cloud is built on. And you don’t lose control over how it’s done. With a data center network that stretches from Dallas to Paris to Hong Kong, SoftLayer lets you specify where your data lives in order to minimize latency and increase compliance across your system.
softlayer.name: softlayer-it

softlayer.description: If you have a demanding cloud application, you need SoftLayer™. It provides the flexibility of both virtual and dedicated bare metal servers, but is as easy to deploy as a public cloud. SoftLayer gives you the high performance you need without having to sacrifice control.
softlayer.deeplink_description: Control of your cloud should belong to you. See how SoftLayer gives you oversight of your infrastructure as you build it.
softlayer.name: softlayer-default

softlayer.description: If you have a demanding cloud application, you need SoftLayer™. It provides the flexibility of both virtual and dedicated bare metal servers, but is as easy to deploy as a public cloud. SoftLayer™ gives you the high performance you need without having to sacrifice control.
softlayer.subhead: Not all clouds are the same. While other services let you provision only in the public cloud, SoftLayer™ lets you control the entire data center—from the server, storage and security hardware, to the very location of that infrastructure. So highly regulated industries, like finance and healthcare, can host data in its country of origin, ensuring compliance while running a global enterprise.
softlayer.deeplink_description: Control of your cloud should belong to you. See how SoftLayer gives you oversight of your infrastructure as you build it.
softlayer.name: softlayer-lob

softlayer.description: Your data is neither here, nor there. SoftLayer helps to make data available when and where you need it. Virtualize, manage and scale your servers in the cloud. See how SoftLayer works for your business.

softlayer.video_description: The demands of your business should dictate how you build your cloud infrastructure. Watch as a cloud expert walks you through what to consider when deploying a cloud.

softlayer.document_title: Building a smooth experience for customers
softlayer.document_description: Tiket.com is one of the largest event and travel ticketing sites in Indonesia. The growing company needed an Infrastructure-as-a-Service (IaaS) partner with high stability, consistent performance and reliable support to ensure site availability and a quality experience for the end user.
softlayer.name: softlayer-document_trial-cta

doc.page_title: IBM - There's A New Way To Work In Cloud and It's Made with IBM
doc.page_description: IBM Cloud's Saas, PaaS and IaaS solutions will help you discover a new way to work and gain flexibility without compromising performance and control.
